mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Some seventy mint copies of this early broadside by John M. Wolff were found in 1932 and distributed as Christmas greetings by Carl W. Dreppard of Lancaster, Pennsylvania ...Subsequently, it was often reproduced in private printings as Holiday Greetings ... It is believed that this was the first separately printed item that carried Moore's name as the author, as compared to the first appearance in a book, The New-York Book of Poetry, in 1837"--Marshall cited below. [original]
"'A Merry Christmas!' and 'Happy New Year!' Issued by John M. Wolff, Stationer, Philadelphia"--At end of text. [original]
Within red decorative border, surrounded by blue double line border. Title in blue and red; author statement, text and publisher in blue. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Barrett Broadside .M66 C57 1842: Copy is slightly smaller than that described by Marshall. Perhaps a later printing? Clifton Waller Barrett Library. Clement Moore Collection. Gift. [original]
